Package biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2

Class FileSystemsOptionBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2.FileSystemsOptionBuilder
  • public class FileSystemsOptionBuilder
extends Object

    Allows to create value of the file systems option.

    Example code: 

     List<String> fileSystems;
 // create a list with standard file systems
 fileSystems = new FileSystemsOptionBuilder().withHttp().withLocal().build();
 
 // create a list with standard file systems (short version)
 fileSystems = new FileSystemsOptionBuilder().withStandard().build();
 
 // create a list with custom file system
 class CustomFileSystem implements FileSystem {
      // omitted implementation
 }
 
 fileSystems = new FileSystemsOptionBuilder().withCustom(CustomFileSystem.class).build();

    Warning: the local file system should be appended as last or not at all.

    Since:
    2.0.0
    See Also:
    FileSystem, LessOptions

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      FileSystemsOptionBuilder()
      Constructs a new instance.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      List<String> build()
      Builds a list with file systems class names.
      FileSystemsOptionBuilder withClassPath()
      Appends the ClassPathFileSystem at the end.
      FileSystemsOptionBuilder withCustom​(Class<? extends FileSystem> clazz)
      Appends a custom file system implementation at the end.
      FileSystemsOptionBuilder withFtp()
      Appends the FtpFileSystem at the end.
      FileSystemsOptionBuilder withHttp()
      Appends the HttpFileSystem at the end.
      FileSystemsOptionBuilder withLocal()
      Appends the LocalFileSystem at the end.
      FileSystemsOptionBuilder withStandard()
      Appends standard file systems at the end.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FileSystemsOptionBuilder

        public FileSystemsOptionBuilder()
        Constructs a new instance.
        Since:
        2.0.0

    • Method Detail

      • withStandard

        public FileSystemsOptionBuilder withStandard()
        Appends standard file systems at the end. If a file system was added before, then it will be removed and added again. Appended file systems:
        1. HttpFileSystem
        2. FtpFileSystem (only if Apache Commons Net library in the class path)
        3. LocalFileSystem
        Returns:
        this builder.
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • withLocal

        public FileSystemsOptionBuilder withLocal()
        Appends the LocalFileSystem at the end. If the file system was added before, then it will be removed and added again.
        Returns:
        this builder.
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • withHttp

        public FileSystemsOptionBuilder withHttp()
        Appends the HttpFileSystem at the end. If the file system was added before, then it will be removed and added again.
        Returns:
        this builder.
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • withFtp

        public FileSystemsOptionBuilder withFtp()

        Appends the FtpFileSystem at the end. If file system was added before, then it will be removed and added again.

        Warning: requires Apache Commons Net library in the classpath.

        Returns:
        this builder.
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • withClassPath

        public FileSystemsOptionBuilder withClassPath()
        Appends the ClassPathFileSystem at the end. If file system was added before, then it will be removed and added again.
        Returns:
        this builder.
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • withCustom

        public FileSystemsOptionBuilder withCustom​(Class<? extends FileSystem> clazz)
        Appends a custom file system implementation at the end. If file system was added before, then it will be removed and added again.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the custom file system implementation class.
        Returns:
        this builder.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - is clazz is equal to null.
        Since:
        2.0.0

      • build

        public List<String> build()

        Builds a list with file systems class names.

        Warning: the local file system should be appended as last or not at all.

        Returns:
        the list with class names.
        Since:
        2.0.0
